identity.mission: Create a 'Shopify for Restaurants' that blends professional SaaS efficiency with the vibrant soul of Indian hospitality.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss grid precision with Indian color warmth.
Emotion First: B2B doesn't mean boring. The dashboard should feel empowering, not just functional.
Content is King: Food photos are the heroes. Typography frames them.
Zoom In: Use macro shots of textures (spices, fabrics) for backgrounds.
Negative Space: Critical for the dashboard to prevent cognitive overload.

headings.usage: Main landing page headlines, Storefront restaurant names, Feature highlights

body.usage: Dashboard UI, Menu items, Form inputs, Long text

mono.usage: Order IDs, API keys, Code snippets

secondary.name: Peacock Teal
secondary.usage: Secondary buttons, Success states, B2B branding

assets.icons: Use lucide-react for all UI icons. Use simple, stroke-based icons.

landing_page.strategy: High impact, storytelling. Use 'Yeseva One' for big statements. Use the 'Bento' grid to show features (Analytics, Menu, Orders) in a single view.
sections: Hero: Big headline, 'Get Started' CTA, 3D-ish mockup of the dashboard.
Testimonials: Carousel of happy restaurant owners.
Pricing: Clean cards with 'Most Popular' highlighted in Saffron.

dashboard_b2b.strategy: Density and Clarity. White background for data containers. Use 'Outfit' for numbers. Sidebar nav.
key_elements: Stats Cards: Simple, big numbers, sparkline charts.
Orders Table: High density, clear status badges.
Menu Editor: Split view (List on left, Edit form on right). Support for variants (Half/Full).

storefront_b2c.strategy: Appetizing and Fast. Mobile-first. Big images.
key_elements: Restaurant Header: Hero image, logo, rating, delivery time.
Menu Categories: Horizontal scroll pill badges.
Food Item: Image on right, text on left. 'Add' button with counter.

general: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
All interactive elements MUST include data-testid attribute.
